name: Energy Champion
description:
This education game is being made by SoupFrog in collaboration with TransformNet Zero, an ecologically focused department of the University of Abertay.

Learn how you can be improving the way food and drinks are processed through factories, reduce costs, eliminate waste, and source more eco-friendly alternatives to power and chemical components!

Controls

Left Mouse Click to move around the level

Left Mouse Click on magnifying glass to interact 

Credits

Dan Mackenzie (Producer)

Ben Ramsay (Level Designer/Artist)

Sean Dunsmore (Programmer)

Cabhan Dunsmore (Programmer)

Josh Moulding (Former Artist)

Full Gameplay - https://youtu.be/kquo06bVwVQ

If you have suggestions to help making this game better, please tell us in the comments! Thanks!
